directions: Combine soy milk, avocado, chocolate syrup, tahini, vanilla extract, and stevia in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into 4 ice pop molds, and freeze until solid, at least 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: ½ medium avocado, pitted and peeled
2 (1 gram) packets stevia sweetener (such as Truvia®)
title: Chocolate-Tahini Ice Pops
